ygData.title: SAGA Chat/Discussion
ygData.description:
WELCOME to the Southern Arizona Gender Alliance (SAGA) Chat/Discussion group!

SAGA organizes educational, social, and support programs for transgender, transsexual, and gender-variant people and their allies in Southern Arizona.

For upcoming meetings and events, please visit the SAGA-AZ Yahoo calendar

SAGA Chat is a chat group; as such we encourage discussions and even debates. This is an opportunity for us to get to know each other a bit better. The following is a guideline to assure a measure of decency. While we do not censor comments based on political or ideological point of view, comments that are abusive, engage in personal attacks, contain racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, or other slurs, express hatred, use excessive foul language, or include any other type of ad hominem attacks (including comments that celebrate the death or illness of any person, public figure or otherwise) will be subject to removal. In other words . . . be thoughtful and play nice. * ad hominem: adjective 1. appealing to one's prejudices, emotions, or special interests rather than to one's intellect or reason. 2. attacking an opponent's character rather than answering his argument. .

We invite you to explore others of our Yahoo groups:
SAGA-AZ: SAGA news and related info
SAGAchat: discussion of general transgender and transition issues
Dezert Girlz: news & discussion group for female-identified trans people
Dezert Boyz: news & discussion group for male-identified trans people
Dezert Partnerz: news & discussion group for cis-gender partners of trans people
ygData.name: sagachat
